https://tmrev.io/movie/436330-1000 Mexicans 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zbbp9tWgQUK7ALxvEbP9SMGxJuZ.jpg Lukas and Adam are best friends and roommates on the Hamburger Kiez. Lukas, single-minded, clever and creative, is well on the way to making a career in an advertising agency. Adam, a charming hothead, tries in vain to gain a foothold in the Hamburg film industry. He still holds on to their shared childhood dream, one day to found a film production with Lukas. Lukas, on the other hand, prefers to avoid professional collaboration with his chaotic friend. 1000 Mexicans
